EDITORIAL-ITEM.SUBJECT: h2g2 - Creative Content Written By You

TR.TD:
How To Find A New Flat In A Hurry - Sometimes you don't get much notice when you need to move home. This Entry is here to help you.
Indus - This constellation was named after the four tribes of people who originally lived in the Americas.
Columbus, Ohio - This US city, known as 'cow town' by residents, was named after Christopher Columbus and founded in 1797.
On this day: 18 September, 1709 - Father of the English dictionary, Dr Samuel Johnson, is born.

PICTURE.ALT: A man and a woman search for accommodation.

RSS Feeds - With RSS feeds you can get all the latest h2g2 stuff delivered straight to you.
QUOTE OF THE DAY: 'Seems a little odd since the Earth and all the characters were destroyed in every possible reality. How do you follow that up?'

EDITORIAL-ITEM.SUBJECT: Write an entry for our online Encyclopedia - and read what others have written...
EDITORIAL-ITEM.BODY:
Don't panic - the most reassuring words you're likely to read all day. There really is no reason to panic, because h2g2 is your guide to Life, the Universe and, well, Everything. We have thousands of entries on all manner of subjects, all written by people like you. If we don't have the one you want, you can even write it yourself.
If you'd like to join in, simply create a free h2g2 account to get started.

P.LINK: The Infinite Improbability Drive - Read a Random Entry from the Edited Guide
